actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for an election of an annuity under section 377 of title 28, United States Code, for any qualified magistrate judge.

summary.text: Authorizes the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to accept the election of a qualified magistrate judge (i.e., any person who retired as a magistrate judge before November 15, 1988, and who, on the date of filing the election, is serving as a recalled magistrate judge on a full-time basis and has completed at least five years of full-time recall service) to receive an annuity and to provide for survivor annuities.Provides that full-time recall service performed by a qualified magistrate judge shall be credited for service in calculating an annuity elected under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an election of an annuity under section 377 of title 28, United States Code, for any qualified magistrate judge.
